title: Zero Gravity eSports LoL Team LF Plat 4+ ADC

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Zero Gravity eSports (@zGeSportsGG). Oceania based eSport organisation Business Enquiries: zerogravityesports.gg@gmail.com. Australia

body:
Hi my name is Primal, I am both Captain and Manager of the Zero Gravity eSports LoL Team.

Currently we are looking for an ADC to trial.
Requirements for application:
- Actively played through season 8
- Plat 4 rank minimum
- Previous team environment experience highly regarded
- Decent communication etiquette
- Willing to accept constructive criticism
- Appropriate attitude to improve

Contact me via League client, or join our Organisations [discord](https://discord.gg/KEAECSH) and ask for me, Primal, in the #general-lounge channel.
